summary: All six requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-6) have been implemented. The application includes: a robot character interface with state-based animations (REQ-1), browser-based voice input using Web Speech API (REQ-2), backend grammar/pronunciation analysis logic (REQ-3), child-friendly correction feedback display (REQ-4), conversational flow with context maintenance (REQ-5), and a playful educational design with vibrant colors and child-appropriate styling (REQ-6). No requirements are missing, and no hallucinated features were detected.
